33 // Class definitions
35 enum class AnimMotionBehaviorFlag {
36  kDestroyOnDone = 1 << 0, // Whether or not to destroy motion when done playing
37  kAutoPlay = 1 << 1 // Whether or not to move motion to the next available state when done playing
38 };
39 MAKE_FLAGS(AnimMotionBehaviorFlag, MotionBehaviorFlags);
40 MAKE_BITWISE(AnimMotionBehaviorFlag);
41 
42 enum class AnimMotionStatusFlag {
43  kPlaying = 1 << 0 // Whether or not the motion is playing. If false, is paused
44 };
45 MAKE_FLAGS(AnimMotionStatusFlag, MotionStatusFlags);
46 MAKE_BITWISE(AnimMotionStatusFlag);
47

78  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
81 
85  bool queueMove(const GStringView& stateName);
86 
88  bool isAutoPlaying() const {
89  return m_motionBehaviorFlags.testFlag(AnimMotionBehaviorFlag::kAutoPlay);
90  }
91 
93  bool isDone() const;
94 
96  bool isPlaying() const {
97  return m_motionStatusFlags.testFlag(AnimMotionStatusFlag::kPlaying);
98  }
